metadata.synopsis: Bartender of Blushing Mermaid prompts players to speak with the pub owner, seeing them entering

0.speaker: Bosun Gannet
0.text: Welcome to the Blushing Mermaid - we've got rules, and they will be followed.
0.context: NodeContext: sigh upon seeing an unfamiliar face - thinks the player is a tourist who was looking for a 'nice' pub (blushing mermaid isn't nice)
